**Initial Setup of RStudio**

Before working with RStudio for the first time, I would recommend changing the following Global Settings. While this is not strictly necessary, they are generally recommended due to certain reasons.

## Changing the options

![](global_options.png)

## Unchecking boxes

Please ensure that the following boxes are **unticked**

-   Restore most recently opened project at Startup

-   Restore Previously Open Source Documents at Startup

-   Restore .RData into Workspace on Startup

![](uncheck_boxes.png)
